general.name: granada_fsps
general.short: migrated from old datamodel - needs update
general.description: This file contains the plate merged output of the Granada Flexible Stellar Population Synthesis (FSPS, Conroy et al. 2009 ) Spectro-Photometric Stellar Mass computation of the BOSS galaxy product, according to the algorithm documentation .

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description: The BOSS Galaxy product assumes a WMAP 7 ΛCDM cosmology with <var>H</var><sub>0</sub> = 70, Ω<sub>m</sub> = 0.274, and Ω<sub>Λ</sub> = 0.726.

hdu1.description: The BOSS Galaxy product assumes a WMAP 7 ΛCDM cosmology with <var>H</var><sub>0</sub> = 70, Ω<sub>m</sub> = 0.274, and Ω<sub>Λ</sub> = 0.726.

MAGSCALED_ERR.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

KE.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

CMODELABSMAG.name: CMODELABSMAG
CMODELABSMAG.description: Cmodel absolute magnitudes in all ugriz bands, K+E corrected at z_0=0.55
CMODELABSMAG.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

M2L.name: M2L
M2L.description: Mass-to-light ratio in all ugriz bands, K+E corrected at z_0=0.55
M2L.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

M2L_MEDIAN.name: M2L_MEDIAN
M2L_MEDIAN.description: Median Mass-to-light ratio in all ugriz bands, K+E corrected at z_0=0.55. It corresponds to the value of PDF at which 50% of the M/L probability is accumulated
M2L_MEDIAN.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

M2L_ERR.name: M2L_ERR
M2L_ERR.description: 1-σ error associated to M2L_Median in all ugriz bands.
M2L_ERR.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

M2L_MIN.name: M2L_MIN
M2L_MIN.description: Minimum Mass-to-light ratio (lower 68% confidence level) in all ugriz bands.
M2L_MIN.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

M2L_MAX.name: M2L_MAX
M2L_MAX.description: Minimum Mass-to-light ratio (higher 68% confidence level) in all ugriz bands.
M2L_MAX.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update
